original_text: When Jesus said this, the man started to hear. Also, his tongue was able to move properly so that he could speak clearly.
korean_text: 그의 귀가 열리고 혀가 맺힌 것이 곧 풀려 말이 분명하여졌더라

sentences.original_text: Also, his tongue was able to move properly
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 그의 혀가 제대로 움직일 수 있게 되었고

sentences.original_text: so that he could speak clearly
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그가 분명하게 말할 수 있었습니다
